
I can't run anymore. They won't give up. I need water.

NAME dialog13
DLG ITM_c

DLG ITM_0
Don't think they can follow me here.

DLG ITM_1
I can barely see... but at least it's quiet.

DLG ITM_2
I think I see a light.

DLG ITM_3
I'm so thirsty.

DLG ITM_4
Maybe I can make it back to the village at night.

DLG ITM_5
The Odoshishi need to sleep sometime.

DLG ITM_6
I must be almost out!

DLG ITM_7
I can smell fresh air!

DLG ITM_8
What... is that?

DLG ITM_9
I don't recognize this writing.

DLG ITM_a
I don't      understand

DLG ITM_b
There's some light!

DLG ITM_c
i

END 0
I returned to Violet village. I told everyone what I found, but I never found that cave again.

END 1
I awoke next to the river, just outside Violet. I was desperate for a drink, but first... I had to find some paper.

END 2
I awoke next to the river, just outside Violet. I was desperate for a drink, but first... I had to find some paper.

END 3
I awoke next to the river, just outside Violet. I was desperate for a drink, but first... I had to find some paper.

VAR a
42
